apiModel.title: API Model
apiModel.description: This api will give you only a read only access to the blogs and categories. You can use this api to show the blogs and categories in your frontend. Filtering by category, status, search term and sorting is also available. The only write operation is to increment the read count of a blog.

endpoints.title: Get All Blogs
endpoints.description: Fetch all the published blogs with pagination and filtering.
endpoints.extra:
**Wrappes the requested blog models array in the model below:**
```json
{
  "data": [...],
  "page": 1,
  "take": 12,
  "total": 471
}
```
